text: Rauni-Leena Luukanen-Kilde (15 November 1939 - 8 February 2015) was a Finnish physician. She wrote and taught about parapsychology, ufology and mind control. Luukanen-Kilde died in Vaasa in February 2015 after a long illness, aged 75.Mikko Juuti, "Ufologi Rauni-Leena Luukanen-Kilde on kuollut" , Ilta- Sanomat, 9 February 2015 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Finnish scientists Category:Finnish writers Category:Physicians
title: Rauni-Leena Luukanen-Kilde
